key.name: idle-threshold-minutes
key.description: Number of minutes of inactivity before showing idle notification

key.name: update-interval-seconds
key.description: Polling interval in seconds for checking statistics (fallback when file monitoring is disabled)

key.name: file-monitor-enabled
key.description: Enable real-time file monitoring for instant updates when OpenCode processes tokens

key.name: realtime-idle-enabled
key.description: Enable real-time idle detection from OpenCode events (recommended for instant idle notifications)

key.name: daily-budget-usd
key.description: Maximum daily spending limit (0 = no limit)

key.name: monthly-budget-usd
key.description: Maximum monthly spending limit (0 = no limit)

key.name: budget-alert-threshold
key.description: Show alert when reaching this percentage of budget
